alert.note: Alert for Brown; Outagamie; Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:57PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Brown, northeastern Outagamie and eastern Shawano Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Navarino Wildlife Area, or 10 miles southeast of Shawano, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pulaski around 615 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Anston, Hofa Park, Rose Lawn, Kunesh, Pittsfield, Landstad, Zachow, Laney, Frazer Corners and Angelica. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
